name: Captain Claw - The Remake
description:
Background

As part of our studies, we produced a short remake of the incredible "Captain Claw". 

Transforming the game from 2D to 3D and mainly focusing on the platformer aspects of the game, we've created a taste with our own 'spin' of the story.

The game is built for speed runs, with numerous easter eggs and cool locations to discover.

The Team
  • Tamar Aizenberg - Lead & Environment Design 
    • https://www.artstation.com/maraaizen
    • https://www.linkedin.com/in/tamar-aizenberg-77239b199/
  • Tamir Koren - Level Design
    • https://www.linkedin.com/in/tamir-koren-14804a231/
  • Guy Eraich - Development
  • Sheer Eden - Art

With special thanks to Ido "The Captain" Ron, our voice actor

We hope you'll enjoy the game!
